text:
A warm and impressed Roman Catholic church with one of the strangest crucified Jesus Christ I have ever seen. The only option for travel is the bus since the church does not locate near MRT station. The time for mass is as below:

+ Sunday (4 masses): 7 AM - 9 AM - 11.30 AM - 5.30 PM and one Saturday mass at 5.30 PM;
+ Weekdays: 6.30 AM - 6.15 PM
+ Public holidays: 8.00 AM.

Beautiful, spacious and peaceful church. Clear audible sound system and wide pews. Thank you for the lunchtime  weekday Mass.  Appreciate the time for quiet prayer before Mass and friendly Greeters at the door.
This is one of the most vibrant Catholic Church in Singapore. Every Mass is packed and people are warm and friendly. Palm Sunday Mass was beautiful.
Modern Catholic Church at Pasir Ris area. Large and spacious hall to cater for a fairly large congregation.

Vibrant. The people are welcoming, friendly, and helpful. The food are great too! Totally Affordable and so tasty, homemade taste.
The canteen catered for kids as well with many toys they can play with.
